scripts.build:packs:src: fvtt package unpack --inputDirectory Data/systems/dod/packs --outputDirectory Data/systems/dod/packs_src/dod -n dod && fvtt  package unpack --inputDirectory Data/systems/dod/packs --outputDirectory Data/systems/dod/packs_src/dod-macros -n dod-macros
scripts.build:packs:db: fvtt package pack --inputDirectory Data/systems/dod/packs_src/dod --outputDirectory Data/systems/dod/packs/dod -n dod && fvtt package pack --inputDirectory Data/systems/dod/packs_src/dod-macros --outputDirectory Data/systems/dod/packs/dod-macros -n dod-macros
